english_example_sentence: If I add a little more spice, the food will be more delicious.
russian_example_sentence: Если я добавлю немного больше специй, еда будет вкуснее.
turkish_example_sentence: Ben biraz daha baharat eklesem, yemek daha lezzetli olur.
